Articles.Content:
Hello!

Im new, so i present myself with this beast:

![RlGOb0f.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/RlGOb0f.jpg)

![oGUAMou.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oGUAMou.jpg)

![UxWcOnx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UxWcOnx.jpg)

Fuel filled with other ship launches.

The Kratos is completely useless but its aggressive ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You can find this 400 tons ship here: [http://kerbalx.com/Chiodo/KRATOS-X](http://kerbalx.com/Chiodo/KRATOS-X)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T11:45:07Z" title="04/18/2015 11:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by Chiodo**
Nice to see another italian here =) Great craft btw.

Thank you Eorin ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif) nice to meet you!![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
@Chiodo: you have been spotted ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif), waiting for you to show up where we all speak italian. Nice craft BTW.

... I should be more in the Italian section too...

(Salutoni da Genova ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

... and for an italian design, like a Ferrari or a Ducati, it's totally worth a spin in space in my saves too ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Italian, eh? So it looks beautiful, but breaks down every 20 feet? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Italian, eh? So it looks beautiful, but breaks down every 20 feet? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

No just a real supercar, not another american musclecar u.u kidding i love your car designs. Talking about planes recently us fighters are not totally famous for their durability (im looking at you f 22 and 35 u.u), but at least you have your own planes :s

Hello italian mates XD nice to meet you

Ps: F35 = Sudden Death ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif):0.0:

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-18T22:55:59Z" title="04/18/2015 10:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 18, 2015</time> by Chiodo**

That's a very original looking design. I do like it. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Cupcake...
Cool looking design. Also how many gees does that thing pull with those two enormous engines?

> 
> That's a very original looking design. I do like it. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
> Cupcake...

Thanks ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

\*-\*

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Cool looking design. Also how many gees does that thing pull with those two enormous engines?

Do you meen this?

I don't know if i'm doing it right, this is at max speed

![8ewqxvC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8ewqxvC.jpg)
Guys if you have any request for this amazing crazy bad cool ship, just say that to me ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Man, those batmobiles are getting scary.
